Package model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
model.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, TableModel
public class Board extends AbstractTableModel
This class represents the board of the game. it contains every method to interact it extends AbstractTableModel because in the graphic part is shown like a table

      public void randomFillBoard(int numOfPlayers)
